title: Journey Orchestration Step Event Action Execution Fields
description: This Fieldgroup will have Journey Action Metadata Fields.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: GUID generated when the action is first authored on the JO canvas. Replicating the same action indirectly, by means of duplicating the journey or publishing a new version does not generate a new actionID.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionName
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Name of the action as it appears on the Journey Canvas, if the action is internal to JO Runtime, then action name is set to stepName field.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionType
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Denotes the action channel invoked. E.g: Email, SMS, customHttp

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionParameterized
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: True if the journey runtime passed in dynamic values retrieved at runtime to successfully execute the action. E.g: This field will be set to true, if a custom http action requires some values from external data sources for successful execution.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionExecutionTime
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Time(ms) inside Journey Engine to call the necessary APIs to execute the action.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionExecutionError
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Error condition that prevented Journey Runtime from executing the action. E.g: timeout on the action step, capping on the action API etc, http error.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionExecutionErrorCode
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Error code corresponding to actionExecutionError.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionExecutionOriginError
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: In case of timeout or http error, the latest API response message. E.g: invalid payload, internal server error.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionExecutionOriginCode
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Error code corresponding to actionExecutionOriginError.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionBusinessType
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: The business solution powering the executed action. E.g: ACC, Epsilon.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: deliveryJobID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: (Deprecated).This describes the delivery Job Id for the batch Journey.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: batchDeliveryID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: (Deprecated).This describes the delivery Id for the batch Journey.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: fromSegmentTrigger
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: (Deprecated).This describes if the Batch Journey triggered from Audisence Segment.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionSchedulerCount
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Number of times the Journey Runtime Scheduler was invoked to fulfil the given journey step. E.g for a Wait step, count of actionSchedulerCount=1

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: MessageID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Message ID referenced in inline message action of a journey

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: PublishedMessageID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Published message ID in inline message action of a journey

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: InteractionType
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Indicate the interaction type, either 'marketing' or 'transactional'. Remark: this will be relevant for message and custom actions

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: SurfaceID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Surface ID

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: Channel
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Channel Name like email, push, sms

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: IsSendTimeOptimized
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Indicate if the message execution has been delayed by applying a send time optimization

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: ActionGroupID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Action Group ID

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: ActionGroupName
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Action Group Name

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: ExperimentationID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Experimentation ID

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: ExperimentationName
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Experimentation Name

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: TreatmentID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Treatment ID applied to execute the action

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: TreatmentName
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Treatment name applied to execute the action

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: ActionErrorContext
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Provides context of the error. Potential values: 'authCallError': error has occured in scope of custom or Adobe.IO authentication by calling the authentication endpoint to generate an access token, 'callError': error has occured on action call endpointTreatment name applied to execute the action

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: Consent
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Fields corresponding to action consent.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: RejectedPoliciesCount
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Count of rejected consent policies

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: RejectedPolicies
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Rejected Consent Policy details array object.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: ID of the rejected Consent policy.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: Name
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Name of the corresponding rejected Consent policy.
